item.title: viewscape in R
item.description: This is an integrated tutorial about viewscape and dsmSearch. These two packages were initially one before getting published because I thought it would be cool if one can just specify a geographical area without DSM/DEM to compute a viewshed(s). This has been explained the purpose of making the dsmSearch, which was two functions for searching and downloading point cloud data via API. Of course, viewscape is not designed for computing the viewshed even if this is the core of the package.
